name: Eilene Ronio
text: Fresh food had to wait a little but it was good. One of the servers was more worried about being on her phone but did get my order in for the buffet. The cooks are slow getting pizzas in the ovwn and out to the buffet, I recommend this place for a quick bite but having to wait for the buffet to get stocked for lunch is ridiculous!

name: Diana Wilson
text: Out of ingredients to make half our order. Cancelled part of order & still charged us too much. Cannot recommend at this time.

text: Very satisfied. The waitress was awesome very courteous , friendly and attentive.

name: vanessa dunlap
text: My family and myself always enjoy going to Pizza Hut in Frederick. The store manager Misty works just as hard as her employees if not harder. The remodeling looks nice and the food is always great!

text:
Employees were great.
The Place had a nasty smell to it. It was hard to sit to eat but we did so.
